English.invalidNumber: Hmm... that doesn't look like a valid number.
English.operation:
Choose an operation:
1) Add 2) Subtract 3) Multiply 4) Divide
English.invalidOperation: Hmm... that doesn't look like a valid operation.
English.again: Would you like to perform another calculation?

1) Sumar 2) Restar 3) Multiplicar 4) Dividir

German.secondNumber: Geben Sie die zweite Zahl ein:

Klingon.operation: ghu'vam Daqawlu' vIghro' 1) 'oH 2) subtract 3) multiply 4) divide

Pirate.welcome: Ahoy, ye scurvy dog! Welcome to Calculator!
Pirate.firstNumber: Enter the first number, ye scallywag:
Pirate.secondNumber: Enter the second number, ye bilge rat:
Pirate.invalidNumber: Arrr... that be no number, yer testin' me patience!
Pirate.operation:
Choose an operation, ye swashbuckler:
1) Add 2) Subtract 3) Multiply 4) Divide
Pirate.invalidOperation: Arrr... you'll walk the plank if ye keep this up!
Pirate.result:
I be no mathematician, but I believe
the result be:
Pirate.again: Would ye like to perform another calculation, ye scurvy dog?
Pirate.thanks:
I be mighty grateful for ye using Calculator!
See ye on the the open seas!
